<xsd:simpleType name="VersionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains information to which version of the web service the client refers. The following situations are indicated:
- Version equals a value lower than 2: This situation corresponds with the situation that no version element is sent. That is the situation before the current version of the web service (v10). - Version equals a value equal to 2: This situation corresponds with the situation that the version element is relevant. From version 2 and higher, the elements CardProvider, CardSubType and CardPersonalized are returned in CardInformationType - Version equals a value equal to 3: This situation corresponds with the situation that the version element is relevant. From version 3 and higher, the elements ServiceType, ServiceTime and Replacement are returned in CardInformationType - Version equals a value higher than 3: RFU.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="BlockTargetType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Card"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Epurse"/> con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://schemaserver/schemas/1.0/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemaserver/schemas/1.1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns:new_customer> <ns1:control_area> <ns1:source>SOAPUI</ns1:source> <ns1:source_send_date>${#TestCase#datum}</ns1:source_send_date> <ns1:user_name>ISS_REMOTE</ns1:user_name> <ns1:message_id>4E539A20378811E6C9BB0000003E7ABA</ns1:message_id> <ns1:correlation_id>12</ns1:correlation_id> </ns1:control_area> <ns:person sushi_wash="J" override_birthdate="N"> <!--Optional:--> <ns:name_initials>${#TestCase#initialen}</ns:name_initials> <ns:first_name>${#TestCase#voornaam}</ns:first_name> <ns:last_name>${#TestCase#achternaam}</ns:last_name> <ns:sex>${#TestCase#geslacht}</ns:sex> <ns:birth_date>${#TestCase#gdatum}</ns:birth_date> </ns:person> <ns:company sushi_wash="J"> <ns:name>NS</ns:name> </ns:company> <ns:addresses> <!--1 to 3 repetitions:--> <ns:address delete="N" sushi_wash="J" has_permanent_issues="N"> <ns:street>${#TestCase#straat}</ns:street> <!--Optional:--> <ns:house_nr>${#TestCase#hnr}</ns:house_nr> <!--Optional:--> <ns:house_nr_ext></ns:house_nr_ext> <ns:postal_code>${#TestCase#pcode}</ns:postal_code> <ns:city>${#TestCase#plaats}</ns:city> </ns:address> </ns:addresses> <!--Optional:--> <ns:email> <ns:email_address verified="N" deleted="N">${#TestCase#email}</ns:email_address> </ns:email> <ns:general_customerdetails override_contactstatus="N"> </ns:general_customerdetails> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ns:ecard_customerdetails> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ns:ecard_customerdetail> <ns:engraved_id></ns:engraved_id> </ns:ecard_customerdetail> </ns:ecard_customerdetails> </ns:new_customer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns0='http://nsc.nl/xi/internet'; //isValid

con:config.script:
f = new File ("G:\\NSC-Klantsystemen\\AfdelingKS\\Projecten\\NS Flex\\SOAPUI\\LogFile_NS_Flex - ACC.xml") def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def response1 = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( "New Customer - Aanmaken nieuwe klant#Response" ) def nsr = response1[ "//ns1:customer//ns1:nsrcustomer_nr" ] as String def voornaam = response1[ "//ns1:customer//ns1:person//ns1:first_name" ] as String def achternaam = response1[ "//ns1:customer//ns1:person//ns1:last_name" ] as String def email = response1[ "//ns1:customer//ns1:email//ns1:email_address" ] as String def date = new Date() as String
f.append(date + ";" + "Nieuw klant is aangemaakt " + ";" + "xxxxxxxxxxxxxx" + ";" + "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" + ";" + nsr + ";" + email + "\r\n")
log.info voornaam + " " + achternaam + " is aangemaakt"

con:testSuite.name: TestSuite - NS Flex order aanmaken met nieuwe klant

con:config.script:
//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) )

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

con:testCase.name: NS Flex - WKVR_K2 - Bestellen - 1 week in het verleden

con:config.script:
//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) ) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "3daginverleden", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()-7) )

con:config.script: log.info ( "ET550 & ET551 succesvol opgehaald van de NAL")

con:testCase.name: NS Flex - DLVR_K2 - Bestellen - 30 dagen in het verleden

con:config.script:
//Vullen van huidige datum en tijdstip als source send date Date date = new Date() String datePart = date.format("yyyy-MM-dd") String timePart = date.format("HH:mm:ss.ms")
println "datePart : " + datePart + "\ttimePart : " + timePart
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "datum",datePart + "T" + timePart + "Z") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigvan",datePart) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "huidigedatum",datePart)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "geldigtot", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()+1825) ) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "30daginverleden", new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd').format(new Date()-30) )

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://schemaserver/schemas/1.0/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemaserver/schemas/1.1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns:get_customer> <ns1:control_area> <ns1:source>SOAPUI</ns1:source> <ns1:source_send_date>${#TestCase#datum}</ns1:source_send_date> <ns1:user_name>ISS_REMOTE</ns1:user_name> <ns1:message_id>4E539A20378811</ns1:message_id> <ns1:correlation_id>12</ns1:correlation_id> </ns1:control_area> <!--Optional:--> <ns:data_owner_code/> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 3 items at this level--> <ns:nsrcustomer_nr>20306251</ns:nsrcustomer_nr> <ns:engraved_id>3528010496448685</ns:engraved_id> <ns:data_owner_customer_id/> <!--Optional:--> <ns:customer_profile_details>all</ns:customer_profile_details> </ns:get_customer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Ophalen NAL
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ns0:NALStatusFeedback xmlns:ns0="Accenture.NAL.BT.Direct.Channel.FeedBackServicesIn"> <ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:Version>1.0</ns0:Version> <ns0:RetailerID>4</ns0:RetailerID> <ns0:CreationDate>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:CreationDate> </ns0:FileHeader> <ns0:FileBody> <ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> <ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode> <ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel> <ns0:ChannelOrderID>${#TestCase#order_retailer_id}</ns0:ChannelOrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:OrderID>${#TestCase#order_id}</ns0:OrderID> <!-- Wijzig --> <ns0:PaymentReference/> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>2104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << REFUND --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>9</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineResult> <ns0:LineNum>2</ns0:LineNum> <ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus> <!-- Check in group (NAL Item nummer ZPROS_ORDER_DR) --> <ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>${#TestCase#datum}</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime> <ns0:ActionID>3104133</ns0:ActionID> <!-- MIOS_NSC0150_NAL_RetrieveOLMCard --> <ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType> <!-- << SALE --> <ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>3</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber> <!-- Let op --> </ns0:LineResult> <ns0:ResultCode> <ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code> <ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description> </ns0:ResultCode> </ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage> </ns0:FileBody> </ns0:NALStatusFeedback> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
